cleaned_text: An important but oft-overlooked aspect of a spiritual practice is self care. These are key products from my favorite natural skincare lines that are not only inspired by crystals or filtered through crystals - these products are actually made with crystals themselves! Luxurious, safe AND high vibrational, just how we like it. Shiva Rose Blue Crystal Eye Cream Eye cream is the one product most worth splurging on. This ultra-luxe rich cream combines the powerful azulene of blue tansy with hydrating and plumping properties of hyaluronic acid, healing calendula, anti-aging evening primrose and soothing aloe. Additional ingredients include blue chamomile, rooibos, lavender and pomegranate. And that's not all. According to the skincare goddess herself, "sacred sandalwood creates new cells, diminishing lines and opening the third eye." It's activated by [Azurite](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B06VY8XGND/ref=as_li_qf_sp_asin_il_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=crystalrookie-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B06VY8XGND&linkId=249e7d7499590da6359dbdd82dfa9ae8) crystals, deep blue beauties that will assist you in opening that aforementioned third eye. Or at least help decrease crow's feet. Sjal Rose Aura Cleansing Set Sets are an easy way to totally overhaul your skincare routine! Created by the author of upscale crystal bible [Elemental Energy](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/0062428799/ref=as_li_qf_sp_asin_il_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=crystalrookie-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=0062428799&linkId=af4743d7f70e443cfc301c886bb00568), this entire line is deeply influenced by crystals and their beautifying properties. This luxurious three-part cleansing ritual is infused with powerful bio-actives to detoxify and tone while locking in moisture. There are two versions of the set available; one comes with [a rose quartz stone](https://sjalskincare.com/products/rose-aura-cleansing-set). A deep pore cleanser gently softens and exfoliates the skin while eliminating blackheads, dirt and excess oil. Soak the sponge in warm water and apply the cleanser directly to it, massage the sponge gently until it is soft (make sure to soak that sponge - otherwise you're in for a painful crystal-infused ritual). After cleansing, apply the energy tonic toner. Tracie Martyn Complexion Saviour A plumping and soothing mask from celebrity facial phenom Tracie Martyn, this all-natural skin care product and luxurious oil free mask hydrates, purifies, and protects. The mask features their trademarked Gemceuticals®, formulated with [Malachite](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B071CNLBJS/ref=as_li_qf_sp_asin_il_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=crystalrookie-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B071CNLBJS&linkId=5ce57903d3bed83c1dc797d83d87e66c) crystals. This [organic mask](https://www.traciemartyn.com/products/tracie-martyn-complexion-savior) and natural skin treatment has anti-oxidant properties, perfect for someone who gets a lot of sun exposure or wants a product that covers a lot of bases.
